title: Central Santa Domingo Escape with Three Restaurants & Infinity Edge Pool
description: Begin your Dominican Republic escape with a stay at the five-star InterContinental Real Santo Domingo, an IHG Hotel. This urban oasis, located in the heart of the city, offers bountiful opportunities for relaxation with a world-class spa and an incredible cabana-lined infinity-edge pool winding around the third floor rooftop. Savour authentic cuisine at any of the hotel's three restaurants, including fresh grilled lobster at Factory Steak & Lobster or tasty sashimi at Nau Lounge.
